[A] When the Battle Opponent of your other Character becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your ::Demon Continent:: Characters, and that Character gains +500 Power for the turn.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 ::Demon Continent:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] If all your Characters are ::Demon Continent::, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Decapitating Demon Blade" is in your Climax Zone and you have 4 or more other ::Demon Continent:: Characters, you may choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or placed by the CX COMBO of "Rimuru, Figure Received" to the Stage, you may place the top card of your Clock into your Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(3) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room, send this to Memory] At the end of this card's attack, if "Nameless Story" is in your Climax Zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your Library into the Waiting Room. If all of those cards are either ::Demon Continent:: Characters and/or YELLOW Climaxes, choose a Character in your Waiting Room and place it in the Slot this was in.

[C] All your other ::Demon Continent:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 "Crystal of Wisdom", reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in your Waiting Room. If there were at least 1 Climax card among them, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your ::Demon Continent:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, all players perform the following action. "If you have 5 or more cards in Memory, choose 4 cards in your Memory, and place all cards in your Memory that were not chosen into your Waiting Room."
[A] [Discard a card from hand to Waiting Room] When this card is placed from hand to Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a level 0 or lower Character in your Waiting Room and place it to any slot on the Stage.

[C] ASSIST All your ::Demon Continent:: Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a YELLOW Climax and this has 1 or less Markers under it, you may choose a card in your Waiting Room and place it underneath this face-up as Marker.
[S] [(1) Put 2 Markers from under this into the Waiting Room] Choose a YELLOW card in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] For each of your other ::Demon Continent:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or by the [A] ability of "Ranga, Opportunity for Success" to the Stage, until the next end of your Opponent's turn, this gains +4500 Power and the following ability. "[C] In battles involving this, no players may play BACKUP from hand."
[A] [(1) Discard a ::Demon Continent:: Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if you have another ::Demon Continent:: Character, you may pay cost. If so, put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] [Discard a Climax from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Demon Continent:: Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library and put them on top of your Library in any order.
[A] When this attacks, if you have 1 or fewer other Characters, you may put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If it's a Level 0 or lower Character, put it in any Slot in the Back Row.

[C] You cannot play Events or BACKUP from hand.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may put that Character to your Opponent's Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock into their Waiting Room.
[A] When this attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your other ::Demon Continent:: Characters.

[C] If you have 4 or more ::Demon Continent:: Characters, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] CX COMBO [Put a "Reliable Existence" from your Climax Zone to the Waiting Room] At the end of this card's attack, if you have 4 or more other ::Demon Continent:: Characters you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 2 ::Demon Continent:: Characters from among them, show them to your Opponent, put them in your hand, put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room, and return it to your hand.

[C] If "Rimuru, For My Friends" is in your Clock, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, draw up to 2 cards, discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room, and put up to 1 card from top of your Library in your Stock.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Demon Continent:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [Rest this] If this does not have a Marker under it, choose a ::Demon Continent:: Character in your Waiting Room and place it face-up underneath this as Marker.
[S] [(1) Rest this] Return a Marker from underneath this in your hand.

[S] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room, put this in the Waiting Room] If you have another ::Demon Continent:: Character, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and move it to an empty Slot on their Stage.

[C] All of your Opponent's Characters gain "[A] ENCORE [(2)]".

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Demon Continent:: Character, this gains +1 Soul for the turn. (Put the revealed card back)
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Cost of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[C] If there are 2 or more Markers under this, this gains "[C] ASSIST All of your Characters in front of this gain +1000 Power".
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, place all of your "Rimuru, Life Crisis" in Marker and Waiting Room and place them underneath this face-up as Marker in any order.

Choose up to 1 card from among your Marker and Memory and return it to hand.

[C] This cannot Side Attack.

If so, choose up to 1 "Dragon Star Diffusion Explosion" in your hand, and if you meet the Level and Color requirments of playing that card play it at no cost." [A] If you have a Character with "Milim" in name, reveal 7 cards from the top of your Opponent's Library, your Opponent Shuffles their Library and puts the top X cards of their Library to their Clock. X equals the number of Climaxes revealed by this effect.

Send this to Memory.
[A] RECOLLECTION At the beginning of your Main Phase, if this is in your Memory, choose a card in your Waiting Room and send it facedown to Memory. If you have 3 or more facedown cards in Memory, choose 3 facedown cards in your Memory and place them in your Waiting Room. If 3 cards are placed in your Waiting Room by this effect, Deal 3 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)
